name: Helicopter Gunship Combat Fire Lands
description:
Helicopter Gunship Combat Fire Lands is the most immersive and realistic 3D helicopter battle action game available on store.
Launch the attack on the most dangerous terrorists now!
***Game features***

- Variety of Armors to protect
- Air strike to save you
- Enemies with Gunship helicopters,
- Challenging missions to enjoy the game
- Multiple weapons to fire
- Machine gun
